n, c = map(int, input().split())
a = list(map(int, input().split()))
b = list(map(int, input().split()))

ans = [0] * n
for i in range(1, n):
    ans[i] = min(ans[i - 1] + a[i - 1], ans[i - 1] + c + b[i - 1])

print(*ans)

from math import sqrt
n = int(input())
for i in range(n):
    a = int(input())
    print(int(sqrt(a)))
#!/usr/bin/env python3

n, c = map(int, input().split())
a = list(map(int, input().split()))
b = list(map(int, input().split()))

ans = [0] * n
for i in range(1, n):
    ans[i] = min(ans[i - 1] + a[i - 1], ans[i - 1] + c + b[i - 1])

print(*ans)

# SOLUTION
n, c = [int(x) for x in input().split()]
a = [int(x) for x in input().split()]
b = [int(x) for x in input().split()]

# Using elevator
elevator = [c + b[0]]
for i in range(1, n):
    elevator.append(elevator[i - 1] + c + b[i])

# Using stairs
stairs = [0]
for i in range(1, n):
    stairs.append(stairs[i - 1] + a[i - 1])

# Compute minimum
t = [0]
for i in range(1, n):
    t.append(min(elevator[i - 1], stairs[i - 1]))

print(*t)

n, k = map(int, input().split())
a = list(map(int, input().split()))
b = list(map(int, input().split()))

ans = [0] * n
for i in range(1, n):
    ans[i] = min(ans[i - 1] + a[i - 1], ans[i - 1] + k + b[i - 1])

print(*ans)

n, c = map(int, input().split())
a = list(map(int, input().split()))
b = list(map(int, input().split()))

ans = [0] * n  # list of length n with 0 in every element

for i in range(1, n):
    ans[i] = min(ans[i - 1] + a[i - 1], ans[i - 1] + c + b[i - 1])  # update the minimum cost to reach i

print(*ans)

# Compute minimum

    t.append(min(elevator[i - 1], stairs[i - 1]))

print(*t)

n, c = map(int, input().split())
a = list(map(int, input().split()))
b = list(map(int, input().split()))

# Using elevator
elevator = [c + b[0]]
for i in range(1, n - 1):
    elevator.append(elevator[i - 1] + c + b[i])

# Using stairs
stairs = [0]
for i in range(1, n - 1):
    stairs.append(stairs[i - 1] + a[i - 1])

# Compute minimum
t = [0]
for i in range(1, n):
    t.append(min(elevator[i - 1], stairs[i - 1]))

print(*t, sep=' ')
